scripts.css-compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/ -o dist/css/
scripts.css-minify: cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/book-css.min.css dist/css/book-css.css && cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/book-css-grid.min.css dist/css/book-css-grid.css && cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/book-css-utilities.min.css dist/css/book-css-utilities.css && cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/book-css-reboot.min.css dist/css/book-css-reboot.css
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch scss/ --ext scss --exec "npm-run-all css-lint css-compile css-prefix"
